## preLoadAnimationData() function

Pre-load animation data.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function preLoadAnimationData(source: AvatarAnimationDataSource, fetchFunc?: (url: string) => Promise<Response>): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  source | [AvatarAnimationDataSource](./three-avatar.avataranimationdatasource.md) |  |
|  fetchFunc | (url: string) =&gt; Promise&lt;Response&gt; | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Example


```ts
// Animation fbx files downloaded from mixamo.com
const ANIMATION_MAP = {
  idle: "path/to/idle.fbx",
  walk: "path/to/walk.fbx",
  dance: "path/to/dance.fbx",
  ...
};
if (!isAnimationDataLoaded()) {
  await preLoadAnimationData(ANIMATION_MAP);
}
```
